meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preventive.
meanings.sent1: Her preventivenesses helped her avoid getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The preventivenesses of regular exercise can improve overall health.
meanings.sent3: His preventivenesses in always carrying hand sanitizer became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The preventivenesses of wearing a helmet while biking can save lives.
meanings.sent5: The preventivenesses of locking the door at night gives her peace of mind.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of preventing something.
meanings.sent1: The preventivenesses of wearing sunscreen can reduce the risk of sunburn.
meanings.sent2: Regular check-ups are part of the preventivenesses against potential health issues.
meanings.sent3: The preventivenesses of setting reminders on his phone helped him never miss an appointment.
meanings.sent4: The preventivenesses of studying early for exams can lead to better grades.
meanings.sent5: The preventivenesses of having a fire extinguisher in the kitchen is crucial for safety.
